name: ITCareerFinder
tag_list: it, career, certification, job, training, salary, computer, education, blog
overview:
ITCareerFinder is an information portal and online community for career-minded IT professionals.

Through a diverse network of IT Instructors, Authors & Subject Matter Experts, ITCareerFinder provides practical information and resources for both new and established IT Pros. This includes deep dives into IT certifications, career paths, learning opportunities, job openings, salary comparisons, and a unique blog on hot IT topics.

Because it is often used for research by students, trainers and professionals, ITCareerFinder keeps its content up-to-date with the latest facts, figures & insider perspectives.
